attributes.action: Enable private renters to be granted a mortgage from the banks
attributes.additional_details:
I want Banks to enable private renters to have mortgage so that millions of people can finally get on the property ladder to own a home of their own,

If they can afford to pay more than your average monthly amount for rent then surely the banks can grant them a mortgage which on the UK average a mortgage is far cheaper than the average private rental monthly amount through estate agents / Private landlords
attributes.background: More often than not as a private renter you are actually paying money per month than the average mortgage monthly amounts thus making the average household struggle to save enough money toward a big deposit or to build enough collateral to enquire about getting a mortgage through the banks,

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for lenders.
